item.title: Favorite garments 2021
item.description: Base layer All good options, get the one on sale. Black or orange for consistency. Karrimor quarter zip €15,00 Cheapest one, still waiting to check quality. Craft CORE gain €35,00 Nike pacer 1/2 zip €40,00 Insulation Should be black, because outer layer is orange already and you don't want to be a clown. Arc'teryx Proton LT €300,00 Best combination of style, quality, warmth and breathability.
